forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

comments.text: Hi all! There's a new option on the back of the Me dialog in v171.19 (you're on [version]):
... "Snap body parts"! Tick it, and all of your currently equipped body part positions & rotations will be memorized.
Now when you continue to work on, say, your precisely positioned arm, you can safely delete it and put on the changed arm, and have it snap to where the old version was.
(Pls note this won't automatically re-save a current head's auto-equipping data, so you'd need to re-save that again if you want the new body parts to be taken into account.)
Rumors that this update was caused by recent sacrifices in the Church of Philipp can not be confirmed. Thx Nic & everyone!
